result.purpose: Defines various data models related to proxy services, including activity tracking, balance management, and configuration for blockchain interactions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related data models into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/domains/proxy/models/activity.g.purpose: Defines data models for proxy activity including gas details, transaction tokens, and token balance differences.

internal/domains/proxy/models/balance.go.purpose: Defines data models for managing ERC20 and NFT allocations in a proxy service.

internal/domains/proxy/models/coingecko..purpose: Defines a model for managing Coingecko platform mappings and native tokens.

internal/domains/proxy/models/common.go.purpose: Defines user cursor management for pagination in a proxy domain.

internal/domains/proxy/models/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration models for blockchain proxy services.

internal/domains/proxy/models/dapp.go.purpose: Defines data models for decentralized application (DApp) scanning results.

internal/domains/proxy/models/fiat.go.purpose: Defines the TokenFiatInfo struct for representing fiat token information.

internal/domains/proxy/models/nft.go.purpose: Defines the CollectionDetail struct for NFT collection data.

internal/domains/proxy/models/profile.go.purpose: Defines a model for checking the existence of a user profile based on an address.

internal/domains/proxy/models/simulate.g.purpose: Defines simulation-related RPC methods and their statuses for Ethereum transactions.

internal/domains/proxy/models/token.go.purpose: Defines token models and related types for a proxy service.
